verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: 'm] [ARG2: a doctor] and people ask me about the health benefits of apple cider vinegar all the time a doctor and professor at texas a&m reveals what he says to people that ask him about the benefits of drinking apple cider vinegar he likes to discuss the history of vinegar and then turn the conversation to how it could maybe provide benefits based on research apple cider tommaso del garbo texas am university colds clinical assistant professor of family medicine john silver cure texas a&m university apple cider vinegar cough obesity apple vinegar professor of medicine cider common cold hippocrates gabriel neal
